code: import axiosClient from"./axiosClient";var ProductAPI={getAPI:function getAPI(){var url="/products";return axiosClient.get(url);},delete:function _delete(query){var url="/products/delete/".concat(query);return axiosClient.delete(url);},getDetail:function getDetail(id){var url="products/detail/".concat(id);return axiosClient.get(url);},getPagination:function getPagination(query){var url="/products".concat(query);return axiosClient.get(url);},update:function update(query){var url="/products/update";return axiosClient.patch(url,query);},postNewProduct:function postNewProduct(query){var url="/products/newproduct";return axiosClient.post(url,query);}};export default ProductAPI;
